name: Highlife
description: Originally began along the Ghanaian coast in the 1920s as a blend of western brass band instrumentation and rhythms with traditional Akan Music and Dagomba Music.

children.name: Burger-Highlife
children.description: Created by Ghanaian immigrants to Germany in the late 1970s, generally employing synthesizers and Western post-production techniques alongside guitar-driven Highlife instrumentation.
